Text: Happy Hour This FridayHello Gang Last year we had a successful tradition of hosting Friday night Happy Hours in the heart of Silicon Valley and my favorite place the famous city of Palo Alto So to continue this EvMBA tradition you your significant others and friends are invited to taste the best garlic fries in town and drink some specialty beers at Palo Altos Gordon Biersch located at Emerson St near Hamilton Palo Alto The gathering will take place this Friday October th at and continue through the night with a possibility of dinner and dancing afterwards See you all there Natalia Rachelson Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp
